Summary: looked like mars till it started to move east to west it was higher then a comercial flight that passed under it
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Simi Valley
There were no other sightings in Simi Valley on or around February 3rd 2006
divs: Sighting Detailsi steped out on my patio to smoke a camel as i sat down i looked up in the eat and saw what looked like mars but about 50% brighter i was thinging how odd it looked when it started to move east to west i called my friend to love he said cool and whent back inside then his girl friend drove up and i yelled out and pointed it out to her she watched it as well just before it finally got with in the orion constallation a small white light droped from it then its light turned off as it was moving it would flicker like a star and seemed to drift in random directions as it moved slowly. my reaction and gut feeling is that it was a very high altitude aircraft. i keeped watching even after my smoke was finnished that takes 5 mins
